evidence.claim: Alyve Medical utilizes cloud services for its healthcare platform, ensuring secure data handling in compliance with HIPAA.
The company integrates with EHR systems to facilitate data exchange and streamline patient care.
Alyve Medical adheres to FHIR standards for health data interoperability.
The platform is designed to support various healthcare transaction sets like X12 for efficient billing processes.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of involvement with X12 transactions or API automation.
